dse.name: Component Composition Framework DSE
dse.description: Component Composition framework enables injection of new component plugins into a service that manages and connects all running components dynamically.

dse.name: Contract Information (ContractInformation2Orion **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (FIWARE Lab instance)
dse.description: ContractInformation2Orion is a REST service (developed in Java) which allows clients (e.g. Retailers) to register data about cost of energy produced from the DERs, costs of transmission system and power plants, energy costs in an instance of ORION Context Broker GE.

dse.name: Contract Tailor Processor (ContractManager **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (FIWARE Lab instance)
dse.description: This component will be responsible to calculate a new contract for a specific customer based on an incentive plan (issued by a Retailer and approved by a Market Regulator Authority).

dse.name: Event Sink (EvSi) DSE
dse.description: Local storage of shop floor events

dse.name: FINESCE API Mediator (FAM) DSE
dse.description: It provides a single point-of-entrance to the FINESCE trial infrastructures, exposing the FINESCE API specification. It serves FINESCE-API compatible incoming requests from interested parties, abstracting the heterogeneity of the underlying FINESCE supporting services.

dse.name: Generation Schedule Manager DSE
dse.description: The Generation Schedule Manager is a REST service (developed in Java) which allows clients to access data about the energy generation schedule of energy sources for specified days

dse.name: Hybrid Cloud Data Management (HCDM) DSE
dse.description: This component provides a single interface with private and public data storage platforms

dse.name: Integration kit
dse.description: Documented process including some examples for the established integrations within WP1

dse.name: Issue Detector Processor (Cosmos2SCILAB + INP-SCILAB + SCILAB2Orion **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (FIWARE Lab instance)
dse.description: Detects issues related to power losses and voltage drops (in the lines of a smart LV grid) and then sends it to an instance of ORION Context Broker GE

dse.name: Metering (Metering2Orion **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (FIWARE Lab instance)
dse.description: Metering2Orion consists of: a REST service (developed in Java) which allow clients (e.g. DSOs) to register data about metering and load profile in a specific area into an instance of ORION Context Broker GE + a Java client which accepts data about metering and load profile coming from the smart meters (via either an IoT gateway or an existing legacy system) and then “passes” the data to the above mentioned REST service.

dse.name: Modbus Connector (ModConn)
dse.description: Gateway to a local shop floor network

dse.name: Production Schedule Manager DSE
dse.description: The Production Schedule Manager is a REST service (developed in Java) which allows clients to access data about the planned consumption profiles of an energy flexible factory for specified days

dse.name: Protocol Adapter AMM (Sensor2AMI **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (local instance at ASM)
dse.description: This component will retrieve DLMS/COSEM data from meters installed at the trial site (metering and load profile) and then feeds an instance of IDAS (Backend) Device Management GE with the data (which, on its turn, forwards data to an instance of ORION Context Broker GE

dse.name: Scene Manager DSE
dse.description: Configuration of a set of parameters for alert management

dse.name: Social Events Interface (Social2Orion **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (FIWARE Lab instance)
dse.description: Social2Orion is a REST service (developed in Java) which allows clients (e.g. Social Events Information Providers) to register data about social events (affecting consumption/production in a specific area such as a concert or a football match) in an instance of ORION Context Broker GE

dse.name: Temporal Consistency DSE
dse.description: Pre-processing of large data sets for removing invalid values

dse.name: Weather Condition Interface (WeaFor2Orion **)
dse.site: Terni Energy Grid Management (FIWARE Lab instance)
dse.description: WeaFor2Orion consists of: a REST service (developed in Java) which allow clients (e.g. Weather Condition Information Providers) to register data about weather conditions and predictions in a specific area onto an instance of ORION Context Broker GE + a Java client which retrieves weather conditions and predictions from an external service (forecast.io in our implementation) and then “passes” the data to the above mentioned REST service.
